title: So whats up with CC these days??
body:
It seems to be far far more potent, like if you get stunned its basically game over for you now. 
it wasn't like that last season

is it because of all the bs masteries and new damage/crit items or something? 
is everyone just doing more damage which makes the CC feel like it lasts longer or something?

Just had a game where there was a Leo a Zed and a shaco, Leo ulted and caught 3 of us in the stun area, and by the time the stun ended, all 3 of us were dead under our own turret, all from full health, and thats not the only example, everyone by now is familiar with how dangerously long Poppy and Brand's stuns are. They all just seem longer than they did last season.


is it just me? or is it because everyone is dealing more damage quicker? or is there another reason?

replies.body:
Burst damage is in a really highpoint in LoL right now.
I've been saying it for ages, but landing CC wins teamfights, now it's even more true.
Probably Thunderlords and new items, a lot of new items have damage attached also Thunderlords is op atm so you get hit by one stun then the normal damage plus all the preseason damage things

>is it because of all the bs masteries and new damage/crit items or something?
is everyone just doing more damage which makes the CC feel like it lasts longer or something?

There are several reasons that come into this and i will list them in order of how relevant they are to why this has happened.

Mastery: Thunderlords, this is just annoying, and when 2/3 hit you in a row, your health bar is gone.
Less tanks, they made tank AD items stronger, and people are still too retarded to actually get hybrid tank/ad items on AD champs.
Hybrid tank items are lacking in terms of armor, and AD items make itemizing straight AD extremely easy, leading to death by about 2-3 autos, which is about how long you last in a leona ult.
